datastructures.graph.Digraph

  • Packages that use Digraph 
    Package Description
    algorithms.graph.components  
    algorithms.graph.cycle

    datastructures.graph  

    • Uses of Digraph in algorithms.graph.components

      Constructors in algorithms.graph.components with parameters of type Digraph 
      Constructor and Description
      KosarajuSharirSCC(Digraph G)
      Computes the strong components of the digraph G.
      TransitiveClosure(Digraph G)
      Computes the transitive closure of the digraph G.

    • Uses of Digraph in algorithms.graph.cycle

      Constructors in algorithms.graph.cycle with parameters of type Digraph 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectedCycle(Digraph G)
      Determines whether the digraph G has a directed cycle and, if so, finds such a cycle.
      DirectedEulerianCycle(Digraph G)
      Computes an Eulerian cycle in the specified digraph, if one exists.
      DirectedEulerianPath(Digraph G)
      Computes an Eulerian path in the specified digraph, if one exists.

    • Uses of Digraph in algorithms.graph.search

      Constructors in algorithms.graph.search with parameters of type Digraph 
      Constructor and Description
      BreadthFirstDirectedPaths(Digraph G, int s)
      Computes the shortest path from s and every other vertex in graph G.
      BreadthFirstDirectedPaths(Digraph G, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer> sources)
      Computes the shortest path from any one of the source vertices in sources to every other vertex in graph G.
      BreadthFirstSingleDirectedPath(Digraph G, int s, int f)
      Computes the shortest path from s and a single vertex in graph G.
      BreadthFirstSingleDirectedPath(Digraph G, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer> sources, int f)
      Computes the shortest path from any one of the source vertices in sources to a single vertex in graph G.
      DepthFirstDirectedPaths(Digraph G, int s)
      Computes a directed path from s to every other vertex in digraph G.
      DepthFirstOrder(Digraph G)
      Determines a depth-first order for the digraph G.
      DirectedDFS(Digraph G, int s)
      Computes the vertices in digraph G that are reachable from the source vertex s.
      DirectedDFS(Digraph G, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer> sources)
      Computes the vertices in digraph G that are connected to any of the source vertices sources.
      TopologicalOrder(Digraph G)
      Determines whether the digraph G has a topological order and, if so, finds such a topological order.

    • Uses of Digraph in datastructures.graph

      Methods in datastructures.graph that return Digraph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Digraph Digraph.reverse()
      Returns the reverse of the digraph.
      Constructors in datastructures.graph with parameters of type Digraph 
      Constructor and Description
      Digraph(Digraph G)
      Initializes a new digraph that is a deep copy of the specified digraph.
